post.body: Good luck. 5424 may be out, but 5324 isn't old enough to go for dirt cheap. ;)
5 x 3GBit should do it. :)
I think the question is what *not* to do with 4x Quad cores and 96 GB RAM. I just hope you have a EQL there for I/O b/w. :)
can you snap a photo of where that connects to the system board? You'd be surprised what you can find out there! :)
CD-ROM plugs in somehow. ;)
Just get an IDE to CF adapter... assuming you're thinking what I think you're thinking. ;)
Japan? :)
I would like to see/hear your work some time.
Used Walmart. 1 Hour pickup and cheaper than other options.
That is the most confusing tweet of the day.
i'm more worried about the nasties in it than on it. This one was BAD
it went in the trash
I've smoked whole chickens many times. They usually weight 3-4 lbs though. Big birds will be new for me!
Don't let the temporarily low gas prices lull you into that!
XP on the Mac was as a backup for our main presentation laptop..... and it turned out to be a wise case of planning for the worst.
Is that the TB fighting the cold air? ;)
I find that EasyWorship is far easier to train non-geeks to work with.
Anyone ever tried putting non-NetApp blessed FC drives in a NetApp unit?
Working on Christmas card list. Do Ihave your address? :)
It looks like we are within sight of choosing our ChMS. Iwill be calling our vendor(s) tomorrow to negotiate. :) #CITRT
Broadcasting live now! See Redeemer Bible Church Tomball at http://tinyurl.com/5ctawn
Getting ready to unload gear at Redeemer Bible Church in Tomball
Grandma unexpectedly took both kids home with her for an overnight stay. Executing operation "Unplanned Date Night" Bravo Alpha.
Anyone have and deep discount codes for Snapfish? Gotta get some Christmas cards made! :)
making network cables
Hanging out in the car with kiddos while Sandy buys some gifts in Bath & Body works.
Got out of bed at 10:15 and have absolutely no clue where my family is!
Listening to Andrew Peterson... Love this music, but I think the Redeemer Bible Church band rocked it harder than he does. :)
Preparing to call Birch and forward the old phones to our new system!
Anyone out there in twitter world and #CITRT ever used Bacula? http://www.bacula.org/en/
The Dremel is your friend..... Who needs clearance? :)
UGH!!! Not sure how in the world I could have anticipated this one. Clearance issues stink!!! http://twitpic.com/ve6q
I think that the most disgusting part of any IT person's job has got to be handling users' keyboards.... am I wrong? YUCK!!!!
Looking into how long it will take to smoke two 15 lb turkeys. Looking like around 8 hours likely. Can't wait!!!!
Yep, it's monday.. It's 7AM and I've been fighint fires at work for over 2 hours already. :(
http://twitpic.com/v3dg - MBP to the rescue at our Christmas service. The Dell was being flaky. Yes, that is EasyWorship on XP.
Preparing for the massive temp drop overnight with cold front. Low of 29 tomorrow. It's about 70 right now!
"Well, my name's Dewey Oxburger. My friends call me Ox. I dont know if you've noticed, but I got a slight weight problem."
http://twitpic.com/ul1m - How to make a Mac stable
I think every OSXupdate makes my MBP less and less stable. I'm now wishing OSX was as stable as Vista!
